sentences.French: Le ciel est bleu et clair aujourd'hui.
sentences.English: The sky is blue and clear today.

sentences.French: Je suis allé à la plage hier.
sentences.English: I went to the beach yesterday.

sentences.French: Je pense que mon professeur de français est cool.
sentences.English: I think my French teacher is cool.

sentences.French: J'ai pris le bain ce matin.
sentences.English: I took a bath this morning.

sentences.French: La plage est belle et sèche aujourd'hui.
sentences.English: The beach is beautiful and dry today.

sentences.French: Je suis allé danser hier soir.
Je suis allé à la plage hier soir.
sentences.English: I went to the beach last night.

sentences.French: Je suis allé au cinéma hier soir.
sentences.English: I went to the movies last night.

sentences.French: Les enfants jouent au ballon aujourd'hui.
sentences.English: The children are playing soccer today.
